docs.text: nearly every film tim burton has directed has been an homage to the horror genre -- " frankenweenie , " " beetlejuice , " " batman , " " edward scissorhands , " " ed wood , " " mars attacks ! "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: -- yet none of them have been horror films .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " sleepy hollow " is his first attempt to actually scare people .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i greeted the prospect with high anticipation ; burton's whole career seemed to be leading up to this .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i left disappointed .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: andrew kevin walker's screenplay takes only the character names from the classic short story " the legend of sleepy hollow . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in the movie ichabod crane ( johnny depp ) is a new york city police constable who is trying to introduce scientific methods of investigation to his superiors .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: ichabod is dispatched to the small town of sleepy hollow to investigate a series of murders .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: several of the town's leading citizens have been decapitated by the headless horseman .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: although he rejects the ghost story the town elders tell him , ichabod finds that the facts of the case confound his scientific reasoning .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he also discovers that the killings are not random , that the victims are tied together by a secret .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: along the way ichabod gets help from a bewitching ( literally ) young woman ( christina ricci ) and the son of one of the murder victims ( marc pickering ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: my reaction : ho-hum .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the plot is an accumulation of cliches without even the slightest touch of originality to make it interesting .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: that in itself is forgivable ; hollywood constantly tries to sell us used products in new packages .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: however , burton's attempts at inducing fright come off as goofy .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it might be his background -- in his previous movies , goofy was the goal .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: along the same lines , it doesn't help that creature designer ( and producer ) kevin yagher has done his best work for the tongue-in-cheek tales from the crypt tv series .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a witch's eyes and tongue shoot out like roger rabbit's , a tree spurts blood like it's in a monty python sketch , and the headless horseman .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: well , he's a guy without a head .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: on a horse ( boo ! ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the performances are also awful .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: although he's impressed me with his work in other films , depp doesn't seem to know what to do with ichabod , and his dialogue is hampered by stilted diction that's supposed to pass for an 18th century accent .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: ricci seems to put all her effort into seeming enigmatic , which guarantees that we won't sympathize with her character .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the actor who is revealed at the end to be the villain comes off as ridiculously cartoonish .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the only pleasure generated by the cast comes from surprise cameos by christopher lee , martin landau , and christopher walken .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i wonder if this movie was originally conceived as part of francis ford coppola's projected series of gothic adaptations , a series that produced only " bram stoker's dracula " and " mary shelley's frankenstein . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: coppola is an executive producer for " sleepy hollow , " and the script reflects his interest in early forms of " moving pictures , " particularly in a toy that ichabod carries which blends two pictures to create an optical illusion .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: ( there's a bird on one side of the card , a cage on the other .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: when the card is flipped rapidly , the bird appears to be caged . )
docs.label: negative

docs.text: bottom line : the hollow isn't the only thing that's sleepy .
docs.label: negative
